Package controller

Class ModifyPartController

java.lang.Object
controller.ModifyPartController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class ModifyPartController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class controls the logic of how ModifyPart.fxml functions.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable

    • isBlank

      public String isBlank(String[] textInput, String toggleSource)
      This method compiles the list of blank fields
      Parameters:
      textInput - is a string array of all the fields used to determine which ones (if any) are blank.
      toggleSource - is used to determine whether the Machine Id / Company name field is blank.
      Returns:
      String which will either be blank if there are no empty fields, or which will contain a message listing the blank fields.

    • sendPart

      public void sendPart(Part part)
      This method is used by the MainScreenController to send over the proper part to modify.
      Parameters:
      part - is the part which the MainScreenController sends to be modified.

    • onSaveModifyPartButtonAction

      public void onSaveModifyPartButtonAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method modifies the part already in inventory.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - is used to redirect back to the MainScreen.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • loadMainScreen

      public void loadMainScreen(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method returns to the Main Screen. The message is a greeting. This will be deleted.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - imports the action of a button click which re-directs back to the MainScreen.fxml.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onCancelModifyPartButtonAction

      public void onCancelModifyPartButtonAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This cancels modifying in a new Part.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - imports the action of a clicking Cancel which re-directs back to the MainScreen.fxml.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onInHouse

      public void onInHouse()
      This method addressed boolean logic for InHouse parts and displays the appropriate text.

    • onOutSourced

      public void onOutSourced()
      This method addressed boolean logic for Outsourced parts and displays the appropriate text.
